description: A self-hosted cryptocurrency payment tool that derives HD wallet addresses (BTC, BSC, SOL), scans balances via free-tier APIs, tracks transactions locally, and enables batch fund consolidation — all via a localhost Svelte dashboard.

decisions.initial_constraints: Go 1.22+ backend (Chi, SQLite/modernc, slog), SvelteKit frontend (adapter-static, TS strict, Tailwind+shadcn-svelte, ECharts, tanstack-virtual), single binary deployment, localhost-only, free-tier blockchain APIs only, no CGO, CSRF protection, no stored private keys.
decisions.build_phases: 11 phases: Foundation → Wallet → Explorer → Scanner → Scan UI → Dashboard → BTC TX → BSC TX → SOL TX → Send UI → History/Settings/Deploy
decisions.setup_skipped: CLAUDE.md already fully specified in prework; no additional setup phase needed
decisions.btc_bip84: BTC uses BIP-84 (purpose=84) for Native SegWit bech32, not BIP-44
decisions.sol_manual_slip10: SOL uses manual SLIP-10 ed25519 implementation (~120 lines) instead of external library
decisions.echarts_integration: svelte-echarts v1.0.0 wrapper with tree-shaking, $derived() rune for reactive options
decisions.coingecko_public: CoinGecko public API (no key), 5-min server-side cache, ~5-15 req/min is safe
decisions.bsc_eip155: BSC uses EIP-155 signing with chain ID 56 (mainnet) / 97 (testnet), LegacyTx via go-ethereum
decisions.bsc_manual_abi: BEP-20 transfer uses manual ABI encoding (0xa9059cbb + LeftPadBytes) — simpler than abi.Pack
decisions.bsc_gas_buffer: 20% gas price buffer on SuggestGasPrice for BSC reliability
decisions.bsc_sequential_nonce: Gas pre-seed uses PendingNonceAt once + local increment per TX
decisions.sol_sequential_sends: SOL uses sequential per-address sends (not multi-signer batch) due to 1232-byte TX limit
decisions.sol_zero_sdk: SOL TX serialization built from scratch — no external Solana SDK, only crypto/ed25519 + base58
decisions.sol_legacy_tx: SOL uses legacy (non-versioned) transaction format for max validator compatibility

last_session.summary: Phase 9 complete: SOL Transaction Engine — raw binary serialization, native SOL + SPL token sweep, sequential per-address sends, confirmation polling, 29 new tests, zero external Solana SDK
